title: Solvay Business Game (selected)
institution: Solvay Brussels School of Economics & Management
description: Among 400 selected participants from over 1300 applicants worldwide in Europe's largest business game. However, due to the Covid-19 situation, the event was unfortunately canceled.

title: French Teacher
description: I was a French teacher for groups of children (8 to 12) and adolescents (12 to 16) in Singapore, allowing me to experience teaching in a different cultural environment.

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Teaching Assistant for Object-Oriented Programming, Reasoning and Logic, Algorithms and Data Structures, Calculus, and OOP Project. I developed extensive knowledge in these subjects and acquired valuable teaching skills.
